divs: sighting detailsi was outside at about 13:55 mountain time in westminster, co, watching a flight for life helicopter traveling north to south about 500ft above ground and about 1\4 mile away. right after the helicopter passed i noticed above there was a black streak across the sky from south to north, too fast for any known aircraft, literally a streak. when it disappeared the power went out for about 30 seconds and came back on.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Westminster
There were no other sightings in Westminster on or around August 18th 2012
